posts.post_content:
1912 T202 of Chicago Cubs Frank Chance (HOF) and David Shean flanking photo of entitled "Chance Beats Out Hit".
Graded SGC 70 / 5.5 EX+.
Selling for: $260 (includes postage/delivery Confirmation -- insurance is $5 extra). Paypal accepted without surcharge. Sharp card with strong images  -- the grade would be higher  but for ( I assume) the uneven cut along the borders that is not uncommon with this issue.
Still, a relatively high grade for this set.
First person to accept these terms by emailing me at 
bhodes@rcn.com 
gets the card.
